alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Rawlins; Sherman; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 1:44PM CDT until May 30 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cheyenne County in northwestern Kansas... Northern Thomas County in northwestern Kansas... Rawlins County in northwestern Kansas... Northeastern Sherman County in northwestern Kansas... * Until 145 PM MDT/245 PM CDT/. * At 1244 PM MDT/144 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southeast of Bird City, or 17 miles north of Brewster, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Atwood, Ludell and Herndon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This thunderstorm will produce damaging winds resulting in areas of near zero visibility in blowing dirt. Use extreme caution if you must travel and be alert for rapidly changing visibility.
